name: Blood Brothers (2015)
description:
"To celebrate 300,000 downloads, new players will receive a rare dragon card as a welcome bonus!

Blood Brothers is a dark fantasy game; an epic world of combat-ready knights, elves, goblins and vampires!

The story of a hero turned vampire, with the aim of uniting an army through a blood pact and taking revenge on a corrupt empire.

Choose from eight heroes - knight, samurai, great elf, ape, lizardman, dwarf or goblin - and lead your army to victory!

Exciting battles! Mysterious characters! Secrets to be discovered!

Enjoy Blood Brothers now on iOS!

ANALYSIS

★“One of the most successful crossovers of the strange RPG-Pokemon-Tamagotchi genre that has been multiplying in the App Stores in recent months. Blood Brothers will keep you busy letter by letter for a while." – modojo.com

characteristics

-Show your prowess from archery to sorcery, from lightning bolts to fire!

-Customize your detachment and gain a strategic advantage!

-Tighten the bonds between characters through dark rites!

-Evolve characters and increase their strength!

-Walk through villages, castles, dungeons and many more!

-New characters and areas through free updates!

Explore the endless world of Blood Brothers.

WHAT OTHER USERS SAY:

★ “I love this game! It has a totally innovative concept that sets it apart from all other RPG games out there. If you liked Rage of Bahamut or other card RPGs, you'll love this one--it doesn't follow the traditional concept of these types of games, which I love."

★ “This game is the best! It's basically a fully interactive strategic board game and definitely the best RPG I've ever played on my phone."

★ "If you like any kind of JCC you will love this game". 

★ “Very fun and addictive. If you're a fan of games like Rage of Bahamut where you have to collect and evolve, you can't miss this game."

TIPS FROM OTHER USERS

★ "Use a defensive formation while leveling up new elements and leaving the higher level ones ahead".

★ "Take short or long paths depending on the number of battles you want".

★ "Special events are frequent and you should participate (even at lower levels)".

The world of Blood Brothers knows no borders!
